Source.Name: basis-universal
Source.Description: Basis Universal is a "supercompressed" GPU texture data interchange system that supports two highly compressed intermediate file formats that can be quickly transcoded to a very wide variety of GPU compressed and uncompressed pixel formats.

Package.Name: basis-universal
Package.Description: Basis Universal is a "supercompressed" GPU texture data interchange system that supports two highly compressed intermediate file formats that can be quickly transcoded to a very wide variety of GPU compressed and uncompressed pixel formats.
